column4: like a lot of applications it seems kontact supports multiple identities. do you have more than one identity configured?
Hey thanks--yeah ) have my business -mails and personal hooked up
I had the same trouble with Evolution, and it would be nice to use just one e-mail client instead of several
take a read-through here, he sets up two identities and links them to a number of accounts. maybe you'll find some useful information: http://www.slackermedia.info/kontact/index.html
